lore: As Uraloses always produced everything they needed in their own lands, they never had to consider trading with other peoples. It was not until the end of the Unification War that diplomatic relations with other kingdoms began.\n\nFormations are an important part of this species' battle style. Uralos Spearmasters are always in the rear, protecting the most vulnerable fighters from frontal charges or back attacks they did not fully expect.
menagerieDialog: You're lucky to have someone like me in your party. I'm much smarter than the average bear.
It's not that we get smarter as we grow older; it's that we run out of stupid things to do after a while.
What do you say we stop fighting for the day and have ourselves a pic-a-nic instead?
I hope to find myself a beautiful wife someday to bear my bears.
(It's snoring loudly, surrounded by the remnants of what was once a large, bountiful picnic basket.)
name: Uralos Spearmaster
